data.name: TableAutoFormat
desc: represents an AutoFormat, containing exactly 16 AutoFormat fields.

Each of the 16 fields contain formatting properties for a table cell at a specific position in the AutoFormat range. The rows of the range are divided into a header row, a footer row and 2 data rows (repeated in turn between header and footer row). The columns are divided similar. This results in 16 different types of cells in the range. The AutoFormats are numbered row by row, then column by column.

properties.name: IncludeBackground
desc: specifies whether the background settings from the fields are used.

properties.name: IncludeBorder
desc: specifies whether the border settings from the fields are used.

properties.name: IncludeFont
desc: specifies whether the font settings from the fields are used.

properties.name: IncludeJustify
desc: specifies whether the justification settings from the fields are used.

properties.name: IncludeNumberFormat
desc: specifies whether the number format settings from the fields are used.

properties.name: IncludeWidthAndHeight
desc: specifies whether the column widths and row heights should be updated after applying the format.
